Package model

Class AlienCollection

java.lang.Object
model.AlienCollection
public class AlienCollection extends Object
The AlienCollection class represents a collection of aliens in a game. It provides methods to fill the collection with aliens, move the aliens, check for collisions, and perform other operations on the collection.

  • Constructor Details

    • AlienCollection

      public AlienCollection(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gameGC, int gridWidth, int moveMargin, int gridHeight, int numAlienInRow, int numTotalRows)
      Constructs a new AlienCollection object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      gameGC - the GraphicsContext object for drawing the aliens
      gridWidth - the width of the game grid
      moveMargin - the margin for moving the aliens
      gridHeight - the height of the game grid
      numAlienInRow - the number of aliens in each row
      numTotalRows - the total number of rows of aliens

  • Method Details

    • fillWithAliens

      public void fillWithAliens(int numRow)
      Fills the AlienCollection with aliens in the specified number of rows.
      Parameters:
      numRow - the number of rows of aliens to fill

    • moveAliens

      public void moveAliens(float distance)
      Moves all aliens in the collection by the specified distance.
      Parameters:
      distance - the distance to move the aliens

    • doesHit

      public Boolean doesHit(float x1, float x2, float y)
      Checks if the given coordinates are inside any of the aliens in the collection. If so, removes the alien from the collection and returns true. Otherwise, returns false.
      Parameters:
      x1 - the starting x-coordinate
      x2 - the ending x-coordinate
      y - the y-coordinate
      Returns:
      true if the coordinates are inside an alien, false otherwise

    • isEmpty

      public Boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the collection is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the collection is empty, false otherwise

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the collection.

    • getNumAliens

      public int getNumAliens()
      Returns the number of aliens in the collection.
      Returns:
      the number of aliens
